Entries.default: "Beat it. I don't have time to chitchat." The thin Vailian glances over your shoulder with an expectant frown.
"You again. What do you want?" Bertenno crosses his arms and nods.
This young Vailian's attention is so fixed on making a hasty escape from the Dark Cupboard that he doesn't notice you until you nearly collide.
"Farewell."
"Oh shit! This is getting serious!"
He stares up at your head, distracted, before quickly turning away.
"Shouldn't you be at work or something? This is no place for the likes of you." He frowns with disapproval.
"You stole a pair of gloves from the Dark Cupboard. Give them to me."
"I'm in the market for some gloves. Have any?"
"Not a chance, aimico." He narrows his eyes at you.
Entries.female: "Not a chance, aimica." He narrows his eyes at you.

Entries.default: He eases back, taking your measure with a critical eye.

"Fassina sent you, didn't she? Postenago, just for these?"

Shaking his head, he pulls a pair of fine gloves from his pocket, studying them with evident disappointment.
"Soft as down, but not a single fence willing to pay me a fair price. Maybe they've got imp stink all over them?"
"You're going to have a hard time selling an archmage's gloves for fast coin."
"I'd be willing to pay to take those off your hands."
"Or maybe the stink of failure, you no-good thief."
[Say nothing.]
"Should have guessed these were bad luck. Well, it's too late to go making smart decisions, isn't it?"
"Here he comes, and I'm too late. If Hamuto doesn't give me an extension on my debt, I'm a dead man."
"Really? Where were you when I needed you? Let's get this over with..."
"Keep your mouth shut and follow my lead."
"That might be best."
[Say nothing.]
He opens his mouth to say more, but something to the southwest distracts him, and his expression fills with dread.
Glancing at you, Bertenno shrugs and swallows down a lump in his throat.
He snaps his head to glare at you before his attention is drawn to the advancing party.
[Attempt to trip him.]
[Do nothing.]
He continues his desperate sprint toward the exit.
He stumbles as you hook his leg, but recovers quickly enough to make it to the exit without delay.
[Grab him.]
He races away, panting as he goes.
You grab him by the elbow, stopping him in his tracks. His gaze snaps in your direction with fear and annoyance.
As he twists out of your grasp, he gets snagged on something which breaks free in your hand - a suolenet. He makes a break for the exit in breathless panic.
"I've got your suolenet. If you want it back, return the gloves."
Bertenno feels around his collar. When he realizes he isn't wearing his suolenet, his eyes bulge.
"Damn it... that's the third one I've lost this month! You drive a hard bargain, stranger."
"Sell you armor, sell anything, just get me out of here!"
"I'm free! Free!"
"What have I done?"
"I'll see myself out."
"You... you were the one who grabbed me in the Dark Cupboard. What do you want?"
Moments after you deftly steal back his stolen goods, Bertenno pats his rear pocket, conscious of the absence. He looks up at you with bewilderment and fear.
"No! No! It wasn't supposed to be this way!" He scrambles out of the store, practically tripping on his own feet in the process.
"What the-? Where did I drop them?"
"What the-? Where did I drop them?"
